page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF BRIAN.
page.content: A typical Saturday for me would be to get up at 8.30. Then at about 8.45 I would go in to the village to buy a paper.At about 10.00 I normally have my breakfast with my wife Jayne and my two kids Mark and Lesley.After breakfast I normally help to do the housework then I sit down and watch the television until 12.00. In the afternoon I usually take the car and go to the Club to play snooker with two of my work mates Jim and Simon.At about 3.00 I normally go back home to watch the sport on television and go to to sleep for a while. At 6.00 I have my tea with my family then I bath the children and put them to bed.If we can get a baby sitter my wife and I will go to a friends, or for a meal, or just for a drink. We usually go to to bed at about 12 O'clock.
